description.narrative: By 2015, the % of Caretakers knowledge, attitude and practice to provide appropriate caring and feeding practice for girls and boys under 2 is strengthened, which contributes to Community-Based Management Of Acute Malnutrition, Infant And Young Child Feeding, Nutrition â€“ General, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition. description.narrative: In order to elicit demand of the population for optimal adolescent, maternal and infant and young child care and nutrition, UNICEF continued its support in infant and young child feeding through implementation of growth monitoring and promotion, building capacity of health personnel&integration of IYCF into CMAM in emergency contexts. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2016
